rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language like 'will produce'.
The segment is about production metrics, which are treated as factual reporting (rule 6).
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports production figures, but lacks explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment reports production projections, not outbreak response capability.
Reports production projections (up to 14.9 million tons, up to 15.35 million tons) factually.
